text.__SUMMARY__: Nepenthes gracillima (; from the Latin superlative of gracilis "slender") is a highland Nepenthes pitcher plant species, native to Peninsular Malaysia.
text.Infraspecific taxa:
Nepenthes gracillima f. ramispina (Ridl.) Hort.Westphal (2000) [=N. ramispina]
Nepenthes gracillima var. maior Ridl. (1924)
text.External links: Nepenthes alba and Nepenthes gracillima by Stewart McPherson
